name: Kids
description: Our school is a solution for families who would like to expose their children to the world of music.

name: Teens
description: Our classes help to develop the skills necessary for music learning and a lifelong enjoyment of music.

name: Adults
description: We have programs for everyone. In addition to teaching music to children, we instruct adults and seniors.

name: Private Lessons
description: Private music lessons provide one-on-one attention, so teachers can focus on an individual studentâ€™s needs.

name: Recording Sessions
description: Audio and video recordings in the beautiful Sunnyvale Presbyterian Church for student musicians, for auditions, competition entries, and archives.  2-hour minimum session.

name: Headshots
description: Professional portraits for students and musicians perfect for auditions, applications, and performance marketing. Images are delivered in 3 forms via print-ready, web, and LinkedIn.

name: Sample Classes
description: Sample classes offered for field trips, play dates and birthday parties. Includes musical activities, fun songs and games, hands-on experiences with our piano lab, rhythm and orff instruments,  and optional arts and crafts.  Available weekday mornings, Saturdays @ 9:00 and 1:00.

name: Performances
description: Musicians can be booked for private and business events, for evenings and weekends pending availability.
